item.title: Minisketch and Lightning gossip
item.description: Location: Bitcoin++ Slides: https://endothermic.dev/presentations/magical-minisketch Rusty Russell on using Minisketch for Lightning gossip: https://lists.linuxfoundation.org/pipermail/lightning-dev/2018-December/001741.html Minisketch library: https://github.com/sipa/minisketch Bitcoin Core PR review club on Minisketch (3 sessions): https://bitcoincore.reviews/minisketch-26 https://bitcoincore.reviews/minisketch-26-2 https://bitcoincore.reviews/minisketch Introduction Pretty new to Lightning Network development, joined the Core Lightning team. I’m going to present on Minisketch and what I’ve learnt about the gossip network. Topics I am going to go over the role of gossip in the Lightning Network. Is everyone familiar with Lightning or at least semi enthusiast?
